devdoc.author: GhoSafe Protocol
devdoc.details: This contract should be deployed by the SafeMumbai contract.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.startTimestamp: Timestamp when the loan was started.

returns.isValid: True if the collateral is owned by the contract.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: The contract should be able to receive ERC721 tokens.

params._collateralAmountOrId: Amount or ID of the collateral.

devdoc.title: LoanSafeMumbai Contract

LoanStarted(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a loan is started.

checkLoanCollateral(uint256).notice: Checks if the collateral of a loan is owned by the contract.

seizeCollateral(uint256,address).notice: Seizes the collateral of a loan.

sendBackCollateral(uint256).notice: Sends back the collateral of a loan.
